«collective»
 
 
«collective» is a web-based platform providing a collaborative space to work together with colleagues and project partners. Workspaces can be structured hierarchically (institute, departments, groups, teams, …). «collective» includes calendar and document sections as well as areas to upload and structure files. The task list tool facilitates forum-like discussions and basic project management.
 
«collective» is a customized version of the open source software Open Atrium.
